title: How to Be Good at Hitman

steps.headline: Understand what to do around the guards.
steps.description: Neutralize guards silently. When near a guard and you want to take their disguise, don't use the sedative because you only receive two. Just get your silver baller and use them as a human shield, knock them out then take their disguise. Also, conceal the bodies from guards.

steps.headline: Look around your area to find your target.
steps.description: Make sure that you know your surroundings.

steps.headline: Try to keep away from using firearms.
steps.description: Guns lower your rating, and take a big hit in keeping you away from the silent assassin rating.

steps.headline: Kill the least amount of people.
steps.description: Even guards. Remember you are paid to kill your target, and only your target. Unless you have to, sedate or knock out civilians or guards, but do not kill them.

steps.headline: To achieve the silent assassin rating, you must kill your target proficiently.
steps.description: In order to do this, there must be no witness', so your target has to be on his own. Watch and stalk your target. Learn his routine, and find out all the places when he his by himself. There is always a time when your target is by himself, eg using the bathroom, eating his dinner privately, etc.

steps.headline: Make sure you use accident kills.
steps.description: Accident Kills are always your best choice if they're available.
